file_content.text: Republic scum. Do you really believe you can come here and destroy my creations without conscience?
When you die here today, your feeble Republic will learn what it means to meddle in my work.
In the name of the Republic, I order you to surrender.
Stand down, I'm taking you in.
Surrender? To you? Don't be ridiculous. I could crush your skull with a single hand.
Have you been practicing that line?
Aren't you scary?
Hope you're ready to die.
You're a brave fool, aren't you? But bravery cannot save you.
You're far too late--my plans are already in motion. Soon, the people of this world will be brought to their knees by my greatest creations. My masterpieces.
I don't think so.
What are you talking about, Krel?
Your "masterpieces"?
These are your last words. Don't waste them on threats.
Talk, talk, talk.
This is no idle threat. The droids you destroyed were mere playthings compared to what I have now created.
I have taken ordinary humans off the streets and implanted several of them with advanced cybernetic enhancements. Their abilities now rival even my own.
The cyborgs' enhancements are internal and undetectable. The subjects themselves don't know who among them was augmented. And neither will anyone else--until it's much too late.
I'm going to make you pay for hurting those people, Krel.
You're insane.
If you're waiting for me to be impressed, then get comfortable.
That's great.
Think whatever you wish. You'll soon be dead.
Whatever part of you is still alive, I'm going to kill it.
It's already too late for you.
Fool. This cannot end in any way but your death.
After you've been dealt with, I'll release my creations back to their normal lives, to wait until my hidden programming activates.
This guy's full of it. I don't buy any of this.
Once my masterpieces begin their work, the people of Coruscant will never be safe again.
Not if I stop you.
You can do nothing to stop it. All you can do now is die.
What are these cyborgs going to do?
What are you planning?
I'm afraid you're never going to find out.
I don't buy it.
Believe whatever you like. When it happens, you'll be long dead.
Destroy her!
Destroy him!
